slogan: I use turn coffee into software.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: you should to know.
about.description:
My name is Álex Rueda and i'm full stack developer. Some years ago i decided to refuse Hogwarts Acceptance Letter to learn another type of magic.

I'm currently working as freelancer building software solutions, like movile apps or awesome web features.

Maybe you have heard about MEVN Stack. The most of my software is built with JavaScript and Vue, using Express and MongoDB as backend, but i also have worked with Wordpress and PHP.
about.status: Actualmente estoy estudiando desarrollo de aplicaciones web y trabajando como autónomo.

filosophy.software: Código limpio y mantenible, buenas prácticas, y un diseño que se adapte a cualquier dispositivo.
filosophy.life: Aprender cosas nuevas, compartir conocimientos, y ayudar a los demás.
